last_episode_to_air.name: Conundrum (2)
last_episode_to_air.overview: Adam takes J.R. on an It's A Wonderful Life-esque journey just as Bobby hears a gunshot ring out from J.R.'s room.

name: Dallas
overview: The world's first mega-soap, and one of the most popular ever produced, Dallas had it all. Beautiful women, expensive cars, and men playing Monopoly with real buildings. Famous for one of the best cliffhangers in TV history, as the world asked "Who shot J.R.?" A slow-burner to begin with, Dallas hit its stride in the 2nd season, with long storylines and expert character development. Dallas ruled the airwaves in the 1980's.
tagline: A family ruthless in its quest for power and passion

episodes.name: Digger's Daughter
episodes.overview: Bobby has a wife, and no one in the house of Ewing wants her there. Pamela Barnes is the daught of the most hated man in Jock' history, Digger. This marriage of Bobby and Pam should end the end the Barnes-Ewing Feud, but it only served to escalate it.

episodes.name: The Lesson
episodes.overview: Lucy is playing hooky, and the only person who will actually make sure she get's to school is her new aunt, Pam. But Lucy finds a new way to get out of school, a phony sexual harassment case against her pricipal. It works, but Lucy soon becomes a victime of her own lies as Roger sees the who thing and blackmails Lucy. He can clear the pricncipals name, but only if Lucy "satisfies" him.

episodes.name: Spy in the House
episodes.overview: Pam's brother, Cliff, is unhappy about her getting married to a Ewing. Cliff ends up with a document Pam was supposed to give to Ewing Oil.

episodes.name: Winds of Vengeance
episodes.overview: Trouble occurs in the House of Ewing, when J.R.'s affair reaches the wrong men

episodes.name: Barbecue
episodes.overview: It's time for the annual Ewing Barbecue (where the Ewings feed half of Texas) but there is an unexpected guest, Digger Barnes. But this guest comes along side of unexpected news, Pam's pregnant!

episodes.name: Reunion (1)
episodes.overview: The Ewing family is complete when Bobby and Pam find Gary, the long lost third Ewing brother. But J.R. has other plans: Get Gary out of the house. Something happens to only strengthen the bond between the family and Gary, Lucy brings her mother back to Southfork

episodes.name: Reunion (2)
episodes.overview: JR is frustrated with Gary back, and even more so with the return of Val, but he soon get's his way, as JR often does.

episodes.name: Old Acquaintance
episodes.overview: Jenna Wade, Bobby's ex-girlfriend, arrives in Dallas seeking Bobby's help.  Meanwhile, J.R. hopes that Pam's jealousy will make her decide to leave Dallas.

episodes.name: Bypass
episodes.overview: Jock suffers a heart attack and must undergo bypass surgery in order to survive. Meanwhile, Bobby is skeptical of J.R.'s business ideas.

episodes.name: Black Market Baby
episodes.overview: Worried about not being able to produce an Ewing heir before Pamela does, Sue Ellen decides to pursue illegal adoption.

episodes.name: Double Wedding
episodes.overview: Pam is thrown for a loop when her ex-husband arrives in Dallas claiming they are still legally married.  Upon hearing this, J.R. decides to use it to his advantage.

episodes.name: Runaway
episodes.overview: It's Lucy's birthday, but after a fight with Jock she runs away from home.

episodes.name: Election
episodes.overview: J.R. tries to stop Cliff Barnes from running for state senate and gets help in doing so from Pamela.

episodes.name: Survival
episodes.overview: Sue Ellen and Pamela fear the worst about their husbands when they receive news that an Ewing Oil plane has crashed.

episodes.name: Act of Love
episodes.overview: Sue Ellen is devistated when after having an affair with Cliff, she learns she's pregnant and does not know who the father is.

episodes.name: Triangle
episodes.overview: A love triangle emerges when Ray decides to pop the question to Garnett McGee, a country singer, but she falls for J.R. when he lands her a recording contract.

episodes.name: Fallen Idol
episodes.overview: Guzzler, an old friend of Bobby's arrives in Dallas and the two decide to do business together by opening a shopping mall in Southfork.  However, the rest of the Ewings are strongly against their plan.

episodes.name: Kidnapped
episodes.overview: When Bobby is kidnapped, J.R. and Ray come together to stage a rescue.

episodes.name: Home Again
episodes.overview: Miss Ellie is beyond belief when her brother, Garrison, who has been presumed dead for several years, returns to Southfork very much alive.

episodes.name: For Love or Money
episodes.overview: When J.R. strays from his marriage once again, Sue Ellen leaves Southfork to stay with her mother and sister.

episodes.name: Julie's Return
episodes.overview: Jock gets back together with Julie, his former secretary, who doesn't treat him nice because of his heart attack.

episodes.name: The Red File (1)
episodes.overview: J.R. has Cliff arrested for murder when Julie is found dead.

episodes.name: The Red File (2)
episodes.overview: Pamela is convinced J.R. framed Cliff for Julie's death so Bobby sets out to find out what really caused Julie's death.

episodes.name: Sue Ellen's Sister
episodes.overview: While Pamela is out of town, Kristin tries to seduce Bobby.

episodes.name: Call Girl
episodes.overview: J.R. finds the perfect opportunity to make Pam look bad after she becomes friends with a former call girl.

episodes.name: Royal Marriage
episodes.overview: J.R. believes he can create a business dynasty when Lucy announces that she is engaged to the son of a  Texas oil family.

episodes.name: The Outsiders
episodes.overview: Ray falls for Donna McCullum and J.R. uses the fact that Donna is married to Senator Sam Culver in his plot to stop Cliff.

episodes.name: John Ewing III (1)
episodes.overview: J.R. becomes worried when Sue Ellen beings to drink while she is pregnant.   Lucy also begins to head down a path of self-destruction when she begins to take drugs after her engagement falls apart.

episodes.name: John Ewing III (2)
episodes.overview: Due to her erratic behavior and alcoholism, Sue Ellen is sent to a sanitarium.  When she is able to escape, Sue Ellen delivers her baby following a near-death experience.  Meanwhile, Bobby begins to suspect that Cliff is the father of Sue Ellen's baby.

episodes.name: Whatever Happened to Baby John? (1)
episodes.overview: Sue Ellen suffers post-partum depression and becomes disinterested in her newborn child.  Meanwhile, Cliff claims that John Ross is his son.

episodes.name: Whatever Happened to Baby John? (2)
episodes.overview: Bobby suspects that Cliff is to blame when John Ross goes missing.  Meanwhile, J.R. receives a 1 million dollar ransom demand.

episodes.name: The Silent Killer
episodes.overview: When it is uncovered that Digger has a fatal genetic disorder, Cliff worries that he may have passed on the faulty gene to John Ross if indeed he is the father.

episodes.name: Secrets
episodes.overview: As Pam decides to not tell Bobby she's pregnant due to the family's genetic disorder, Val tries to convince Bobby to have Lucy meet with her.

episodes.name: The Kristin Affair
episodes.overview: Kristin begins to pursue J.R. romantically after he gives her a summer job in his office.  Meanwhile, Bobby learns the truth that Pam is pregnant before she makes a decision about having an abortion due to the risk of genetic defect.

episodes.name: The Dove Hunt
episodes.overview: J.R. and Jock are both shot by a sniper when a man seeks revenge on the Ewing family during a hunting trip in Louisiana.

episodes.name: The Lost Child
episodes.overview: As Bobby bonds with the ranch hand's son, Pam informs him that their unborn child may have a fatal genetic defect.  Meanwhile, J.R. hires a man to tail Sue Ellen.

episodes.name: Rodeo
episodes.overview: At the annual Ewing rodeo, Sue Ellen develops a crush on Dusty Farlow, a cowboy, and Digger uses the event to find time to see John Ross.

episodes.name: Mastectomy (1)
episodes.overview: Miss Ellie worries that her marriage will fal apart when she believes she has breast cancer.  Meanwhile, Sue Ellen has a fling with Dusty, the cowboy; and Alan furthers J.R.'s plan.

episodes.name: Mastectomy (2)
episodes.overview: Miss Ellie must cope with Jock and Lucy's poor reaction to her mastectomy.  Meanwhile, Sue Ellen meets up with Dusty at a hotel.

episodes.name: The Heiress
episodes.overview: Lucy pursues Alan Beam.  Pam confronts Bobby about trying to ruin Cliff and as she does so she inadvertently learns about J.R.'s oil deal in Asia.

episodes.name: Ellie Saves the Day
episodes.overview: J.R. must admit that Southfork may be threatened when Asian oil drilling is delayed by storms and his loan on the property is due.

episodes.name: Mother of the Year
episodes.overview: Sue Ellen's continuing post-partum depression and avoidance of John Ross begins to create conflict among the family.  Meanwhile, Jock must sell the Asian oil leases in order to keep Southfork.

episodes.name: Return Engagements
episodes.overview: Miss Ellie's sadness over Gary's birthday is short-lived when she learns the he and Val plan to marry in Dallas.

episodes.name: Love and Marriage
episodes.overview: J.R. works to get Bobby back in the office so that Jock will be forced to say home.  Pam surrounds herself with her work after losing her baby.

episodes.name: Power Play
episodes.overview: Much to Kristin's surprise, J.R. convinces Alan to marry Lucy.

episodes.name: Paternity Suit
episodes.overview: Digger admits to a reporter that Cliff is the father of John Ross.  After the news breaks, a series of custody suits lead to a blood test that determines the paternity of John Ross once and for all.

episodes.name: Jenna's Return
episodes.overview: As Sue Ellen continues to see Dusty, Bobby meets up with Jenna when Pam leaves town.  Meanwhile, Ray and Donna second guess their relationship.

episodes.name: Sue Ellen's Choice
episodes.overview: Sue Ellen receives pressure from Dusty to leave J.R., which ultimately leads Sue Ellen to ask for a divorce.  Meanwhile, Bobby and Pam's marriage is also on shaky ground due to Jenna's return.

episodes.name: Second Thoughts
episodes.overview: J.R. tries to convince Alan and Lucy to relocate to Chicago, but Jock works to find Alan a law partnership in Dallas.

episodes.name: Divorce - Ewing Style
episodes.overview: When J.R. learns that Sue Ellen is having him followed, he strikes back by stopping her from taking John Ross away from him by proving she is drinking again.

episodes.name: Jock's Trial (1)
episodes.overview: Cliff investigation of the body found on Southfork leads him to suspect that Jock is to blame.

episodes.name: Jock's Trial (2)
episodes.overview: Jock goes on trial for murder.  Sue Ellen begins drinking heavily to deal with Dusty's death.

episodes.name: The Wheeler Dealer
episodes.overview: J.R. continues to try to strike a deal for his Asian oil and Pam sets out to find information on her mother who is believed to be dead.

episodes.name: A House Divided
episodes.overview: Bobby and Pam leave Southfork.  Meanwhile, J.R. is shot following the nationalization of the Asian oil wells which ends up ruining competing oil wells.

episodes.name: No More Mister Nice Guy (1)
episodes.overview: J.R. is rushed to the hospital in critical condition following his gunshot wound.  As the police investigate, they discover many people have the motive for shooting J.R. and everyone patiently waits by J.R.'s bedside hoping he will wake up and identify the shooter.

episodes.name: No More Mister Nice Guy (2)
episodes.overview: J.R., paralyzed after the shooting, undergoes further surgery to help save his life.  While J.R. is in the hospital, Bobby takes over Ewing Oil for the time being.  Meanwhile, Sue Ellen worries that she was the shooter as the police identify more suspects in the shooting.

episodes.name: Nightmare
episodes.overview: Bobby has a hard time running Ewing Oil with J.R. underminding his every decision.  Meanwhile, Miss Ellie finds the gun that was used in the shooting and Sue Ellen, full of guilt, has nightmares about J.R.'s shooting.

episodes.name: Who Done It?
episodes.overview: Sue Ellen is arrested for the shooting and the Ewings abandon her completely, not coming to her aid.  After bail is posted by an unknown person, a session with a psychiatrist reveal the real shooter.

episodes.name: Taste of Success
episodes.overview: Loving his new found power as head of Ewing Oil, Bobby works to accomplish something that Jock or J.R. never did -- buy a refinery.

episodes.name: The Venezuelan Connection
episodes.overview: Jock is torn between Bobby and J.R. when J.R. decides to take back control of Ewing Oil, but Bobby refuses to relinquish his position.  Meanwhile, Pam continues to search for her mother and friends of Lucy meet Mitch Cooper.

episodes.name: The Fourth Son
episodes.overview: Amos, Ray Krebbs' father, arrives in Southfork with shocking news.  Meanwhile, Bobby must deal with his first crisis at Ewing Oil when a tanker and the 600,000 gallons onboard sinks.

episodes.name: Trouble at Ewing 23
episodes.overview: When Ewing 23 receives a bomb threat, the incident gives J.R. an opening to take back control of Ewing Oil.  Meanwhile, Ray reels from the shocking news that he is Jock's son and worries that Donna is slipping away from him.

episodes.name: The Prodigal Mother
episodes.overview: Pam believes that she has finally located her mother.  Meanwhile, Mitch agrees to marry Lucy and J.R. hatches his plan to regain power of Ewing Oil.

episodes.name: Executive Wife
episodes.overview: Pam begins to feel lonely as Bobby spends most of his time preoccupied with Ewing Oil.  Meanwhile, J.R. tries to convince Jock to work on a deal that would go against Bobby.

episodes.name: End of the Road (1)
episodes.overview: J.R. falls for Mitch's sister, Afton, and tries to gain the upper hand when Bobby makes a deal on behalf of Ewing Oil.

episodes.name: End of the Road (2)
episodes.overview: As J.R. flirts with Afton at the wedding, Sue Ellen finds herself pursuing an old boyfriend.

episodes.name: Making of a President
episodes.overview: As J.R. returns to his position at Ewing Oil, J.R. undergoes a public relations campaign in order to help his image.  Meanwhile, Sue Ellen finds Pam with Alex and Miss Ellie continues to be angry with Jock.

episodes.name: Start the Revolution With Me
episodes.overview: J.R. sets out to exact revenge on the Asian government after it takes over Ewing Oil wells.  Meanwhile, Bobby looks into solar energy.

episodes.name: The Quest
episodes.overview: J.R. sets out to put an end to Cliff's potential political career, but is surprised when he learns who else is looking into having a political career.  Meanwhile, Sue Ellen believes she has a stalker.

episodes.name: Lover, Come Back
episodes.overview: Though at first she is overjoyed that Dusty is alive, Sue Ellen's happiness proves to be short-lived.  Meanwhile, J.R.'s dealings in Asia brings the Cartel back to life.

episodes.name: The New Mrs. Ewing
episodes.overview: As Donna and Ray tie the knot, Lucy competes for Miss Young Dallas.  Meanwhile, Jock and Miss Ellie continue to feud.

episodes.name: Mark of Cain
episodes.overview: As J.R. continues to deal in Asia, the Ewing family split over what is being done.  Meanwhile, Lucy's inflated ego over her pageant win creates tension and Sue Ellen continues her affair with Clint Ogden.

episodes.name: The Gathering Storm
episodes.overview: With their marriage on the rocks, Jock threatens to sell Ewing Oil if Ellie divorces him.  Meanwhile, Clint tries to convince Sue Ellen to leave J.R.; Lucy's ego continues to threaten her marriage; and Pam becomes suspicious of Cliff.

episodes.name: Ewing vs. Ewing
episodes.overview: Newlyweds Donna and Ray tries to fix Jock and Ellie's strained marriage.  Meanwhile, J.R. continues to try to sell out Ewing Oil.

episodes.name: New Beginnings
episodes.overview: J.R.'s plan to sell is cut short by Jock and Ellie's reconciliation.  Meanwhile, Jeremy Wendell sets out to get revenge against J.R.

episodes.name: Full Circle
episodes.overview: Kristen makes her return to Dallas; Lucy and Mitch split up; and Cliff meets his mother.

episodes.name: Ewing-Gate
episodes.overview: J.R.'s deals in Asia may end up costing him Ewing Oil, as well as his freedom.  Meanwhile, Dusty tries to get Sue Ellen to take John Ross and leave J.R.

episodes.name: Missing Heir
episodes.overview: The body found in the pool on Southfork is finally identified, which prompts J.R. and Cliff to accuse each other of the murder.

episodes.name: Gone, But Not Forgotten
episodes.overview: Cliff and J.R. continue to clash -- J.R. hatches a plot to get John Ross back, but Cliff decides to leave Dallas.  Meanwhile, Lucy tries to repair her marriage.

episodes.name: Showdown at San Angelo
episodes.overview: With the help of Miss Ellie, J.R. is able to see John Ross while he is at Clayton Farlow's ranch.  Meanwhile, Ray goes into business.

episodes.name: Little Boy Lost
episodes.overview: J.R. gets ready for a custody battle while Bobby begins the search for a child to adopt.  Meanwhile, Cliff meets Katherine, his half-sister.

episodes.name: The Sweet Smell of Revenge
episodes.overview: J.R. confronts the Farlows about John Ross.  Meanwhile, Pam is sent to the hospital following a breakdown.

episodes.name: The Big Shut Down
episodes.overview: J.R. tries to seek revenge on the Farlow's by drying up their oil supply.  Meanwhile, Bobby is able to buy information about Kristin's baby.

episodes.name: Blocked
episodes.overview: J.R.'s plot to dry up the Farlows' oil backfires.  Meanwhile, Pam continues to withdraw from the family.

episodes.name: The Split
episodes.overview: Jock unveils the new plan for Ewing Oil.  Meanwhile, Ray's development runs into problems and Donna's book is published.

episodes.name: Five Dollars a Barrel
episodes.overview: Cliff confronts J.R. about the note he is holding for the Ewings and threatens foreclosure.  Meanwhile, Bobby uncovers a link between Kristin and J.R.

episodes.name: Starting Over
episodes.overview: Miss Ellie discovers J.R.'s true motives as J.R. heads to a broker to look into selling Ewing stock.  Meanwhile, Bobby uncovers the truth about Kristin's baby.

episodes.name: Waterloo at Southfork
episodes.overview: Miss Ellie turns on J.R. as J.R. tries to get Sue Ellen declared an unfit mother. Meanwhile, Ray pulls out of his development deal.

episodes.name: Barbecue Two
episodes.overview: Miss Ellie puts together a homecoming barbecue when she learns that Jock is coming home from South Africa.  However, the plans are put on hold when the family receives a devistating phone call.

episodes.name: The Search
episodes.overview: In shock over Jock's disappearance, J.R., Bobby and Ray head to South America to help the crash investigation.

episodes.name: Denial
episodes.overview: The reality of Jock's death hits J.R. hard.  Meanwhile, Miss Ellie stops Jock's will from being read and Ray and Donna's relationship begins to fall apart.

episodes.name: Head of the Family
episodes.overview: While J.R. recovers from the devistation of Jock's death, Bobby takes over Ewing Oil.  Meanwhile, Bobby lies to Pam about where the baby come from.

episodes.name: The Phoenix
episodes.overview: As J.R. makes his return to Ewing Oil, Ray faces conflict with Bobby and Donna.  Meanwhile, Lucy is stalked by her photographer friend.

episodes.name: My Father, My Son
episodes.overview: J.R. wants Ray's Ewing Oil voting shares and to ruin Sue Ellen and Cliff's friendship. Bobby manages to make some inroads into adopting Christopher. Donna begins to work on her next book. After seeing Mitch with somebody else, Lucy ends up with another man.

episodes.name: Anniversary
episodes.overview: J.R. arranges a job opportunity so that Cliff will be out of Dallas. He then attempts to reunite with Sue Ellen. Donna finds Ray with another woman;.Bobby buys a business for Pam to run. Evelyn informs Lucy that she wants to be with Mitch.

episodes.name: Adoption
episodes.overview: Bobby wants Sue Ellen's approval to allow him to adopt Christopher. J.R. attempts to get Ray's voting shares once and for all. Roger's obsession with Lucy gets out of control. Cliff learns about J.R.'s plan to get him out of Dallas.

episodes.name: The Maelstrom
episodes.overview: Not knowing how Christopher really is, J.R. attempts to find out what happened to Kristin's son. Ray starts to put his life back together. Mitch wants Lucy to agree to a divorce. J.R. meets Katherine Wentworth.

episodes.name: The Prodigal
episodes.overview: Katherine need help from J.R. after Cliff is given power at Wentworth Tool and Dye. Donna discovers a dreadful secret from the Ewing and Culver family pasts. J.R. manages to get his hands on Christopher's birth records.

episodes.name: Vengeance
episodes.overview: Cliff ends up falling for the fake land deal. J.R.'s belief that's he's Christopher's father ends up leading to a blackmail plot. Lucy's request for a different photographer annoys Roger.

episodes.name: Blackmail
episodes.overview: Bobby finds himself being questioned about Farraday's murder. The rest of the family await word about Lucy's kidnapping. Donna reveals what she found out about Jock and Sam's scheme.

episodes.name: The Investigation
episodes.overview: Cliff attempts to get money from Sue Ellen. Bobby and Pam attempt to find Lucy. Bobby receives a visit from Farraday's associates.

episodes.name: Acceptance
episodes.overview: Miss Ellie decides to accept that Jock is dead and comes to a decision on Donna's book. Bobby tries to help the police set up a sting to catch Farraday's killers. Cliff  ends up being fired for embezzlement by his mother; J.R. attempts to win back Sue Ellen.

episodes.name: Goodbye, Cliff Barnes
episodes.overview: Cliff is really upset by Sue Ellen's return to J.R.. Bobby ends up revealing the truth about Christopher's parentage to Pam. Clayton returns to town. Lucy ends up admitting a terrible secret.

episodes.name: Changing of the Guard
episodes.overview: J.R. looses his position as Ewing Oil president and discovers that he's not Christopher's father. A comatose Cliff fights for his life. Lucy awaits to find out if she is pregnant. Holly Harwood meets Bobby and ends up making J.R. an interesting offer.

episodes.name: Where There's a Will
episodes.overview: J.R. attempts to get an early look at Jock's will. Lucy reveals the truth to Pam. Sue Ellen thinks about if she really wants to marry J.R. Marilee Stone offers Cliff a job. Ray learns about Amos Krebbs' health problems.

episodes.name: Billion Dollar Question
episodes.overview: J.R. wants to have Jock's will executed and has the IRS pay a visit to Bobby. Lucy deals with her pregnancy. Miss Ellie decides to go to the Oil Barons Ball. Ray is told about Amos' death.

episodes.name: The Big Ball
episodes.overview: J.R. is still running Harwood Oil and hopes that the Jock Ewing Scholarship will lead to him being declared officially dead. Dusty wants to know if he and Sue Ellen could have a future togther. Ray and Donna go to Amos' funeral.

episodes.name: Jock's Will
episodes.overview: Jock's will ends up revealing the future fate of Ewing Oil. Ray asks Mickey to come stay at Southfork. Pam thinks that Lucy needs to get back to work. J.R. and Sue Ellen decide the date to get remarried.

episodes.name: Aftermath
episodes.overview: J.R. and Bobby start the contest to try and gain control of Ewing Oil. A plot to gain revenge sees Rebecca buying an oil company.

episodes.name: Hit and Run
episodes.overview: Cliff takes over Barnes-Wentworth leaving Pam feeling more torn than ever between the Barnes and Ewing families. J.R. goes to great lengths to gain a drilling variance. Lucy goes ahead with her divorce. Ray is not happy with Mickey's behavior.

episodes.name: The Ewing Touch
episodes.overview: J.R. manages to get a drilling variance and competes with Bobby. Christopher's adoption is finally finalized. Cliff feels Pam should help his company. Mickey continues to infuriate Ray.

episodes.name: Fringe Benefits
episodes.overview: Afton and Sue Ellen attempt to help their men gain a lucrative refinery contract. J.R. isn't happy about aeeing Miss Ellie socializing with men. Pam attempts to convince Bobby to end the contest for Ewing Oil.

episodes.name: The Wedding
episodes.overview: It is the day of J.R. and Sue Ellen's wedding. Ray doesn't want Mickey becoming involved with Lucy. The Cartel wants J.R. to stop over-producing crude oil. Donna comes a decision about serving on the Texas Energy Commission.

episodes.name: Post Nuptial
episodes.overview: Cliff fighrs with J.R. Donnais concerned that being on the TEC will cause more family problems. Bobby believes that J.R. is involved in illegal oil sales.

episodes.name: Barbecue Three
episodes.overview: J.R is confronted by Cliff and the Cartel at the annual Ewing barbecue. Miss Ellie decides that she needs to take action against the effects Jock's will is having on the family.

episodes.name: Mama Dearest
episodes.overview: Bobby and J.R. are not happy about Miss Ellie's decision to contest Jock's will. Afton attempts to get a commiment out of Cliff/ J.R.'s cheap gasoline ends up making the headlines.

episodes.name: The Ewing Blues
episodes.overview: Miss Ellie feels conflicted about contesting Jock's will. Pam meets Mark Graison. Donna thinks about leaving the TEC. Holly wants to end her partnership with J.R.

episodes.name: The Reckoning
episodes.overview: The battle over Jock's will ends up in court. J.R. wants to use Mark Graison to cause problems between Pam and Bobby.

episodes.name: A Ewing is a Ewing
episodes.overview: Cliff wants J.R. to run for office and be out of the oil business. Mark maintains an interest in Pam. Miss Ellie take a holiday in Galveston. Bobby thinks that J.R. has the TEC in his back pocket.

episodes.name: Crash of '83
episodes.overview: Bobby attempts to blackmail Hicks into stopping J.R. J.R. is concerned that Clayton will undermine his standing with Miss Ellie. Mickey and Lucy start to grow closer.

episodes.name: Requiem
episodes.overview: Rebecca fights for her life following the plane crash as Cliff and Pam pray for her recovery. The TEC have a rethink concerning J.R.'s drilling variance

episodes.name: Legacy
episodes.overview: After Pam leaves Southfork it gives J.R. an opportunity to alienate her more from Bobby. Rebecca's will is read following her death. Lucy and Mickey continue to grow closer. J.R. makes a deal in the Caribbean. Clayton admits that he's dating Miss Ellie.

episodes.name: Brothers and Sisters
episodes.overview: Katherine plots to make sure that Bobby sees Pam with Mark Graison. Holly isn't happy about J.R.'s Caribbean oil dealings.  Clayton sells the Southern Cross and moves closer to Miss Ellie.

episodes.name: Caribbean Connection
episodes.overview: Bobby and Ray attempt to stop J.R.'s deal to ship oil to Cuba. Sue Ellen is concerned that her personal life could ruin J.R.'s chances if he enters politics. Donna believes that greed is motivating Mickey's interest in Lucy. Cliff rebounds from his mother's death.

episodes.name: The Sting
episodes.overview: Bobby and Ray are able to stop J.R.'s Cuban oil deal/ Walt and Holly vow to get revenge. Bobby warns Mark away from Pam. Mickey and Lucy kiss.  Katherine wants to help J.R. in his fight against Cliff.

episodes.name: Hell Hath No Fury
episodes.overview: J.R. attempts to gain permission to travel to Cuba. Holly wants to hurt J.R. and Sue Ellen's marriage. Lucy starts to model again. Weather ends up threatening to hurt Bobby's Canadian venture. Ray offers his assistance in the fight for Ewing Oil.

episodes.name: Cuba Libre
episodes.overview: J.R. has to go to Cuba to get his money back. Katherine takes advantage of Mark and Pam's French holiday to make a move on Bobby. Aunt Lil shows up to see Mickey.

episodes.name: Tangled Web
episodes.overview: After having arrived in Cuba, J.R. attempts to get his $40 million back. Katherine confronts Cliff about the drill bit Bobby requires. Miss Ellie quizzes Clayton about his relationship with Sue Ellen. Ray informs Aunt Lil that Jock was his real father and not Amos. Things heat up between Mark and Pam.

episodes.name: Things Ain't Goin' Too Good at Southfork
episodes.overview: J.R.'s infidelity sees Sue Ellen beginning to drink again. Miss Ellie wants to know if Clayton has feelings towards Sue Ellen. Pam returns from France wanting to know what is going on between Bobby and Katherine. Cliff still refuses to allow Bobby to have the needed drill bit he requires.

episodes.name: Penultimate
episodes.overview: Mickey is left comatose following the car crash. Bobby blames Holly and Clayton blames J.R. for Sue Ellen starting to drink again. Lucy blames Sue Ellen for what has happened to Mickey. J.R. offers Holly the chance to buy him out of her company. Mark wants a commitment from Pam.

episodes.name: Ewing Inferno
episodes.overview: J.R. works out that Holly's desire to pay him in installments is because of Bobby. Pam wants a divorce. Aunt Lil believes that it could have been better had Mickey died in the accident. Clayton wants Miss Ellie to travel with him. A fire breaks out at Southfork after Ray and J.R. fight.

episodes.name: The Road Back
episodes.overview: Bobby attempts to rescue those trapped in the fire at Southfork. Mickey opens his eyes.

episodes.name: The Long Goodbye
episodes.overview: Sue Ellen wants autonomy from J.R. Pam and Bobby talk about getting back together. Clayton wants Bobby to look after Miss Ellie.

episodes.name: The Letter

Donna wants to tell Ray about the baby she is expecting.

Jack manages to surprise Jamie.

Mrs. Scottfield and Jeremy Wendell reveal their plans. Sue Ellen and Mandy fight over J.R. Pam is given some wonderful medical news and she she drives home to share the news with Bobby is in involved in an accident.

Sue Ellen comes to a decision about taking April on as a partner. J.R. investigates Wilson Cryder's wife. Bobby ends up receiving a surprise from Pam.

episodes.name: It's Me Again

Charlie is discovered fooling around with Randy again. Nicholas embezzles money from Sue Ellen. Cliff receives a buyout offer.

episodes.overview: Bobby's fury over J.R.'s treachery ends up frightening the rest of the family. Sue Ellen and Nicholas grow closer. Casey asks Sly out on a date. Charlie and Ray fall out again. Clayton attempts to make things up to Miss Ellie.

episodes.name: The Best Laid Plans
episodes.overview: Sue Ellen wants to work with Bobby against J.R. Charlie looks for assistance in dealing with Ray. Laurel Ellis' ex-boyfriend arrives in Dallas. Christopher's custody trial could be cancelled.

episodes.name: Farlow's Follies
episodes.overview: Miss Ellie ends up reacting to Clayton's indiscretions. Kimberly and J.R. attempt to pull the trigger on their scheme. Ray and Jenna attempt to work with Charlie. April lets Bobby know that she is being blackmailed.

episodes.name: Malice in Dallas
episodes.overview: Christopher's custody trial gets under way. April discovers the truth about Nicholas' real identity. Miss Ellie has trouble dealing with Clayton's actions. Charlie's scholastic performance concerns Jenna and Ray.

episodes.name: Crime Story
episodes.overview: April ends up bing intimidated by Nicholas' thugs.J.R. wants Cliff to keep hold of his Weststar holdings. Bobby mixes business with pleasure with Kay Lloyd. Miss Ellie goes to see Lucy. Clayton is blackmailed. Charlie's bad behavior continues.

episodes.name: To Have and to Hold
episodes.overview: April's apartment is broken into. Miss Ellie confronts Clayton. Cliff self-medicates. Charlie has to face the repercussions from her actions.J.R. asks Ray to buy into Weststar. Kay Lloyd shows up in Dallas to see Bobby.

episodes.name: Dead Reckoning
episodes.overview: Bobby continues to see Kay. Jenna begins to have some second thoughts about sending Charlie to boarding school. Ray attempts to help a woman in distress. Cliff and Casey Denault meet; Clayton attempts to explain Laurel Ellis to his wife. Nicholas warns away April.

episodes.name: Never Say Never
episodes.overview: J.R. makes a move on Laurel Ellis as the rest of the family attempts to rally around Clayton. Sue Ellen starts to become suspicious of Nicholas. Bobby is introduced by Kay to a powerful senator.

episodes.name: Last of the Good Guys
episodes.overview: J.R. discovers some crucial evidence in Clayton's homocide case. Kimberly attempts to stop the Weststar takeover bid. Ray goes out with Connie. Casey attempts to partner with Cliff. Bobby and Kay continue to see each other.

episodes.name: Top Gun
episodes.overview: Cliff's drug addiction gets worse. J.R. looks forward to running Weststar unaware of the surprise that awaits him. Bobby feels Kay's career is more important to her than he is. Laurel informs Clayton about the blackmail scheme.

episodes.name: Pillow Talk
episodes.overview: J.R. is determined to gain revenge against Sue Ellen for screwing him out of Weststar. Bobby and Kay attempt to keep their relationship going. Ray attempts to cut Connie loose. Miss Ellie decides on how to handle Clayton. Cliff offers a gas field to Jeremy.

episodes.name: Things Ain't Goin' So Good at Southfork, Again
episodes.overview: Lucy and Jenna both return to Southfork. Sue Ellen attempts to get her son from J.R.'s clutches. April and Cliff work with Casey. Kay is hesitant to leave Washington for a new life in Dallas. Bobby manages to make some progress in being allowed to use the Ewing name for business again.

episodes.name: The Fat Lady Singeth
episodes.overview: Clayton intervenes on Sue Ellen's behalf in an effort to help her gain custody of John Ross. Lucy meets Casey. Ray and Jenna think about  their future together. Jordan Lee claims that he has seen Pam. J.R. and Nicholas are involved in a violent struggle over Sue Ellen.

episodes.name: Carousel
episodes.overview: J.R. is taken to the hospital following his shooting by Sue Ellen. She thinks about filing murder charges against J.R. for Nicholas' death while also facing attempted murder charges of her own. Carter McKay meets Clayton and inquires about buying Ray's ranch. Cliff and April look for Pam. Bobby and Jeremy Wendell clash.

episodes.name: No Greater Love
episodes.overview: Bobby is offered by Clayton a refinery deal. Cliff wants out of the oil business for good. Mitch wants Lucy to return home to Atlanta. J.R. comes back to Southfork. Clayton introduces Miss Ellie to Carter. Sue Ellen purchases a house.

episodes.name: The Call of the Wild
episodes.overview: The Ewing men leave to go on a backwoods hunting trip. J.R. takes a liking to Cally Harper, a local waitress. Cliff offers Jordan Lee a deal to buy Barnes / Wentworth. Casey ends up striking oil.

episodes.name: Out of the Frying Pan
episodes.overview: J.R. finds himself being accused of raping Cally. Bobby ends up making a surprising offer for a partnership in Ewing Oil. Clayton and Carter have to deal with a water shortage on their ranches. Sue Ellen finalizes her divorce from J.R.

episodes.name: Road Work
episodes.overview: Cliff comes to a decision about Bobby's offer to join Ewing Oil.  J.R. attempts to escape from Haleyville's prison. Jeremy Wendell makes a play for Sue Ellen.

episodes.name: War and Love and the Whole Damned Thing
episodes.overview: J.R. manages to escape from jail but there is a price to be paid. Ray returns from Europe. Clayton and Miss Ellie look for a solution to Carter McKay's dam. Sue Ellen works with Jeremy Wendell. Casey wants Lucy to sleep with him. Bobby continues to see Tracey Lawton.

episodes.name: Showdown at the Ewing Corral
episodes.overview: J.R. makes Cally the offer of a new life if he can leave Haleyville. Sue Ellen and Jeremy Wendell continue their relationship. Cliff joining Ewing Oil surprises the whole of Dallas.

episodes.name: Deception
episodes.overview: Southfork is under lockdown with the Carter McKay situation escalating. J.R. attempts to find out his rights as a fugitive. Jeremy Wendell attempts to convince Sue Ellen to seek revenge. Tracey ends up opening up to Bobby.

episodes.name: Counter Attack
episodes.overview: The war with Carter gets worse. April manages to outmaneuver Casey. Sue Ellen worries that she's lost John Ross for good. J.R. looks for help in dealing with his Haleyville ordeal.

episodes.name: The Sting
episodes.overview: Miss Ellie ends up agreeing to sell a small piece of Southfork to Carter. April and Lucy plot against Casey. Sue Ellen has words with Jeremy. J.R. receives some unwelcome visitors.

episodes.name: The Two Mrs. Ewings
episodes.overview: J.R. attempts to find a way out of his marriage to Cally. Sue Ellen thinks about entering the movie business. Weststar's new chairman is announced at the Oil Baron's Ball. Bobby and Cliff attempt to close a deal in Louisiana.

episodes.name: The Switch
episodes.overview: Cally asks Sue Ellen for advice on helping to deal with J.R. Bobby wants to know what Carter is up to. Cliff believes that April's working against Ewing Oil. Nicholas' father decides to investigate his death.

episodes.name: He-e-ere's Papa!
episodes.overview: Cally wants a real wedding to be held at Southfork. J.R. is quizzed for answers surrounding Nicholas Pearce's death. Cliff looks at a real estate deal. Bobby hopes that Christopher will like Tracey.

episodes.name: Comings and Goings
episodes.overview: Sue Ellen makes plans her first movie when she teams up with Don Lockwood and Lucy. Cally manages to become a hero at Southfork. Tommy McKay shows up in Dallas.

episodes.name: Country Girl
episodes.overview: Miss Ellie and Clayton return to Dallas. Cally comes to an understanding with John Ross, and makes a surprise announcement. Tommy  makes a move on April. Don and Sue Ellen continue to plan a movie to embarrass J.R.

episodes.name: Wedding Bell Blues
episodes.overview: J.R. and Cally marry at Southfork though a tornado ends up threatening the ceremony. After Cliff opens a letter meant for J.R. a massive brawl follows. Sue Ellen has Don Lockwood come to Southfork to do some research for the film. Lucy attempts to steer Tracey away from Bobby.

episodes.name: The Way We Were
episodes.overview: Cally attempts to keep Bobby and J.R. on good terms with each another. Sue Ellen grows closer to Don. Tommy becomes involved with drugs. Cliff wants some answers from April.

episodes.name: The Serpent's Tooth
episodes.overview: Sue Ellen and Don continue to see each other.  J.R. attempts to fond out about Weststar's dealings hoping to get back into Ewing Oil. Bobby and Traceys relationship comes under pressure. Christopher is jealous about the amount of time Cally is spending with John Ross.

episodes.name: Three Hundred
episodes.overview: Sue Ellen begins to have some second thoughts about her movie plans. Tommy needs $100,000 and April ends up suffering. Bobby and J.R. end up being forced to talk about their differences.

episodes.name: April Showers
episodes.overview: Cally wants to improve the way she speaks. Sue Ellen begins casting her movie. April admits that she has feelings for Bobby. The situation becomes more desperate for Tommy. Ewing Oil has a major new deal in the works.

episodes.name: And Away We Go!
episodes.overview: Tracey leaves to take care of Tommy. J.R. and Cally manage to get Helstrom into a compromising situation at a Western bar. Bobby sees April in the hospital. Afton returns to Dallas.

episodes.name: Yellow Brick Road
episodes.overview: J.R., Bobby, and Cally travel to Salzburg for business and pleasure. Sue Ellen's movie begins to be filmed. Cliff and Afton continue to see each other. Carter claims to want peace.

episodes.name: The Sound of Money
episodes.overview: Bobby and J.R. refuse to sell Ewing Oil to Brundin and suspect that Carter McKay is behind the scheme. Cliff asks Afton to marry him. Cally proves too much for J.R. who turns to a former flame. Clayton's memory problems continue. Sue Ellen worries about who will be hurt if she continues with her movie plans.

episodes.name: The Great Texas Waltz
episodes.overview: Vanessa makes a play for J.R. Bobby is busy with April's surprise visit, Cliff believes that Afton's daughter could be his. Sue Ellen and Don spend time with John Ross.

episodes.name: Mission to Moscow
episodes.overview: Bobby and J.R. travel to Moscow to find out more about the dealings in Europe. Clayton gets help fwith his memory problems. Sue Ellen discovers that revisting the past is tougher than she thought it would be. Cliff attempts to commit to Afton. Cally and Vanessa meet.

episodes.name: Reel Life
episodes.overview: Bobby and April continue seeing each other, though somebody is out to scare her. Carter is welcomed back at Weststar. Miss Ellie is surprised by a birthday card addressed to Jock. Sue Ellen warns Cally that she'll have to fight to make her marriage work. Sue Ellen issues a threat to J.R.

episodes.name: Phantom of the Oil Rig
episodes.overview: Following the showdown in Europe, Ewing Oil and Weststar begin a new battle. Cliff is preoccupied at work. April's sister, Michelle, shows up in Dallas. Tommy returns home and attempts to make amends. Miss Ellie starts a search to find what the key in Jock's card opens.

episodes.name: The Leopard's Spots
episodes.overview: Tommy claims to be a changed man as he plots revenge against Bobby. Cally's paintings manage to impress a gallery owner. J.R. makes a risky deal without Bobby's knowledge. Cliff manages to locate Afton. The mysterious key sends Miss Ellie and Clayton to New England. J.R. meets April's sister.

episodes.name: Cry Me a River of Oil
episodes.overview: J.R. thinks about agreeing to a risky deal on a tanker when he needs oil badly . Cally has trouble getting past the fact that April once slept with her husband. Michelle meets Cliff in secret. Miss Ellie and Clayton's treasure hunt takes them to the town where Jock first struck oil. Tommy's violent temper gets out of control again.

episodes.name: Ka-Booooom!
episodes.overview: Tommy ends up planting a bomb in Bobby's briefcase in an effort to protect his father against some perceived threats. J.R. comes to a decision about the tanker deal. Cally's art causes further interest. Cliff feels left out of the loop at Ewing Oil. Miss Ellie and Clayton make their way to Pride in Texas.

episodes.name: Sunrise, Sunset
episodes.overview: The tanker that J.R. has purchased is threatened by a Gulf storm. Michelle continues to try and get closer to Cliff. Cally's patron ends up helping her out further. Carter and Tommy are involved in a fatal encounter. J.R. receives a surprise visitor at Ewing Oil.

episodes.name: Pride and Prejudice
episodes.overview: J.R. introduces James to the social scene in Dallas. Miss Ellie and Clayton look around Pride for clues about the key. Christopher goes out on his first date. April wants a commitment from Bobby. Vanessa returns to Dallas.

episodes.name: Fathers and Other Strangers
episodes.overview: J.R. and Cally welcome Vanessa at Southfork. Miss Ellie and Clayton meet Sarah Ewing and find out about Jock's past in World War II when he helped others. Carter receives some bad news about an oil tanker. James ends up making a shocking claim about his true parentage to the Ewings at the Oil Baron's Club.

episodes.name: Black Tide
episodes.overview: The Ewing family are shocked by the news that James is J.R.'s son. A tanker crash creates a P.R. nightmare for both Ewing Oil and Weststar. Michelle attempts to squeeze both Carter and J.R. Vanessa attempts to convince her son to return to Europe.

episodes.name: Daddy Dearest
episodes.overview: J.R. begins to mold James, who seems to already have the seduction line done to perfection. Cliff wants to be part of the official investigation into the tanker accident. John Ross is surprised to have a new half brother. Bobby wants to make commitment to April. Miss Ellie gives J.R. the letter that Jock wrote.

episodes.name: Hell's Fury
episodes.overview: Carter hopes that he can use the tanker accident to help bring down Ewing Oil.  Jock's letter manages to inspire J.R. Bobby receives a surprise visit from Kay. Cally believes that J.R.'s sleeping with Michelle. Christopher and John Ross argue about James.

episodes.name: Cally on a Hot Tin Roof
episodes.overview: Cally thinks that Michelle is lying about her affair with J.R. and she ends up confessing about an affair of her own. Kay attempts to help Bobby to deal with the tanker situation which manages to upset April. J.R. seduces an investigative committee member. James manages to show impressive business acumen.

episodes.name: Sex, Lies and Videotape
episodes.overview: J.R. and Cally manage to repair their relationship. Carter traps Cliff in a sexual blackmail plot. James disapproves of his father's business tactics. Kay wants to know what Bobby's intentions are towards April. Bobby sells Ewing Oil assets to pay for the oil clean-up.

episodes.name: Tale of Two Cities
episodes.overview: J.R.'s attitude about his affairs makes his son realize that sex is a much bigger part of the oil business than he thought. Cally is looking forward to her art show at Lucy's gallery. Michelle finds out about Carter's treachery against Cliff. Bobby and April make wedding plans.

episodes.name: Judgment Day
episodes.overview: J.R. feels guilty, believing the end of Ewing Oil is close. Cliff feels torn between doing what's right and his hatred of the Ewing family. Carter's wife is fed up with his constant mistreatment of her.

episodes.name: Unchain My Heart
episodes.overview: Cliff meets P.R. guru Stephanie Rogers, who tells him that she can make his political dreams a reality.  J.R., Cally, and John Ross travel to Pride to help Miss Ellie. Bobby gives April an engagement ring but they have a fight after. James and Michelle come to terms.

episodes.name: I Dream of Jeannie
episodes.overview: Bobby follows a woman who he believes could be Pam. J.R. meets Blackie Callahan, an old friend of Jock's. April is depressed over her and Bobby's argument. Cliff is suspicious of Stephanie's motives.

episodes.name: After Midnight
episodes.overview: Bobby's obsession with the Pam look-a-like ends up damaging his relationship with April. Blackie helps to drill for oil in Pride. James meets Duke and Melinda Carlisle.

episodes.name: The Crucible
episodes.overview: Carter manages to solve Michelle's problem with Eugene Inagaki. Bobby is unable to stop thinking about Jeanne. Cally and Michelle clash. J.R. gives James a tough business lesson. Stephanie has Cliff prepare to run for office. Miss Ellie and Clayton go to the reading of Atticus Ward's will.

episodes.name: Dear Hearts and Gentle People
episodes.overview: April leaves Dallas in an effort to get over Bobby. J.R. reconnects with Serena. Cally ends up turning to James for support. Cliff manages to get a major political appointment.

episodes.name: Paradise Lost
episodes.overview: James and Michelle have to deal with delays in getting their club up and running and they end up turning to Carter for help. J.R. looks into Stephanie's past and promises Cally he'll be a better husband. Bobby attempts to get April to agree to return to Dallas.

episodes.name: Will Power
episodes.overview: Cally is determined to make her marriage work. April's mother helps her come to a decision about Bobby. Miss Ellie and Clayton investigate their friends' murders. J.R. manages to get some information on Stephanie. James and Michelle fall out. Bobby plans a trip with his son.

episodes.name: The Smiling Cobra
episodes.overview: April gives up her business interests to focus on her wedding preparations. Clayton discovers that he's next in line to inherit Atticus' estate. J.R. pushes Cally to a breaking point in their marriage.

episodes.name: Jessica Redux
episodes.overview: J.R. starts a plan to ruin Cliff and drive Michelle out of town. Miss Ellie and Clayton find out that Jessica Montfort could be involved in the dealings surrounding Atticus Ward's will. Michelle and James continue to be at odds. Bobby decides who the best man will be at his wedding.

episodes.name: Family Plot
episodes.overview: Jessica ends up making a shocking confession. Furious with J.R.'s continued mistreatment and disrespect, Cally and James come up with a plan. Stephanie ends Cliff's political career aspirations after they fall out.

episodes.name: The Southfork Wedding Jinx
episodes.overview: It is the day of Bobby and April's wedding. Cally feels conflicted about her plan for revenge against J.R. after she discovers that she is going to have a baby. J.R. plots to gain control of Jessica's voting rights in Weststar. Cliff meets Liz Adams. Miss Ellie and Clayton leave for an extended Asian vacation.

episodes.name: Three, Three, Three (1)
episodes.overview: J.R. finds that getting to Jessica inside the sanitarium isn't as easy as he thought it would be. Liz recognises Carter McKay from her past. James and Cally talk to a divorce lawyer.

episodes.name: Three, Three, Three (2)
episodes.overview: J.R. manages to get Jessica to sign over her Weststar voting rights. Cliff attempts to convince Liz not to leave Dallas. Liz and McKay manage to reach a mutual understanding about keeping quiet about the past that they shared. Cally and James manage to get their revenge against J.R.

episodes.name: April in Paris
episodes.overview: While on their honeymoon, Bobby and April face a surprise twist from Sheila Foley.  Meanwhile, Cally begins to doubt her decision to work with James and J.R. tries to find a way to get himself out of the asylum.

episodes.name: Charade
episodes.overview: After kidnapping April, Sheila forces Bobby to act as her husband.  Meanwhile, James plays a risky game of high stakes poker; Cliff and Liz's relationship continues; and J.R. rounds the other inmates up to help him in tricking Morrisey into confessing.

episodes.name: One Last Kiss
episodes.overview: April learns that she is being held against her will by Sheila.  Meanwhile, an ally turns on Bobby; and Cally visits J.R. and makes an offer that would get him released.

episodes.name: Terminus
episodes.overview: Back in control of Ewing Oil, J.R. sets out to get even with James, Sly, and Melinda Carlisle.  Meanwhile, Bobby makes a daring attempt to rescue April from Sheila.

episodes.name: Tunnel of Love
episodes.overview: James tries to convince Cliff to go after J.R. who is using the trouble in the McKay's marriage to his advantage.  Meanwhile, after the funeral Bobby begins to hunt down Sheila and turns the blame for April's death on the greed that accompanies the oil business.

episodes.name: Heart and Soul
episodes.overview: As Bobby continues to search for Sheila, Michelle blames Bobby for April's death.  Meanwhile, James tries to find someone to take out his father; J.R. sends in a spy in the Carter's household; and Vanessa Beaumont arrives in Dallas.

episodes.name: The Fabulous Ewing Boys
episodes.overview: Cliff, Liz, and Carter are named as suspects in the murder of Johnny Dancer.  Meanwhile, Michelle offers to help Bobby find Sheila Foley; Cally confides in Vanessa; and J.R. and Clayton have a violent fight that leads Bobby to take action.

episodes.name: The Odessa File
episodes.overview: Bobby and Michelle travel to Odessa to find Sheila Foley and Cliff offers to help after they find a lead on her.  Meanwhile, Vanessa accepts J.R.'s offer; LeeAnne De La Vega arrives in town; and Rose makes a confession.

episodes.name: Sail On
episodes.overview: J.R. tries to stop the sale of Ewing Oil to LeeAnn De La Vega.  Meanwhile, Cliff spirals downhill, hurting his career; James frets over his mother's engagement; and Cally delivers surprise news to J.R.

episodes.name: Lock, Stock and Jock
episodes.overview: J.R. is angered when he learns that James got Cally pregnant.  Meanwhile, Bobby continues on the search for Sheila Foley; Cliff proposes to Liz; and Carter is named the lead suspect in the murder investigation.

episodes.name: S is for Seduction
episodes.overview: LeeAnn and Michelle team up to try to break up J.R. and Vanessa.  Meanwhile, Bobby learns Sheila's real name; and the verdict in the murder trial is delivered, but news from Cliff may change the outcome of the trial forever.

episodes.name: Designing Women
episodes.overview: As LeeAnn's plot against J.R. unfolds, she skips town and leaves a surprise for Michelle.  Meanwhile, Carter begins to plan his revenge after being released from prison and Bobby has dreams about April.
J.R. is kicked out of Ewing Oil by Michelle, who moves to Southfork with James.  Meanwhile, Liz and Bobby wait in Malibu for Hillary Taylor's return.

episodes.name: Smooth Operator
episodes.overview: As Bobby comes face-to-face with Jory, Hillary's daughter, J.R. begins to plot against LeeAnn.

episodes.name: Win Some, Lose Some
episodes.overview: Bobby is faced with a moral dilemma when Jory is kidnapped.  Meanwhile, J.R. begins his plot against LeeAnn.

episodes.name: Fathers and Sons and Fathers and Sons
episodes.overview: The men of the Ewing clan leave together on a cattle drive.  Meanwhile, Carter goes after Johnny Dancer's real murderer and a surprise visitor arrives at Southfork in search of James.

episodes.name: When the Wind Blows
episodes.overview: Carter is finally able to accomplish what he set out to do -- seek revenge on Johnny Dancer's real murderer, Cliff.  Meanwhile, Hillary learns that Bobby had met with Jory; and J.R. tries to get James and Michelle back together.

episodes.name: Those Darned Ewings
episodes.overview: Michelle goes to Cliff for advice when she learns about James and Debra Lynn's past.  Meanwhile, J.R. receives a shocking warning from his doctor.

episodes.name: Farewell, My Lovely
episodes.overview: Michelle and Cliff team up to make Debra Lynn leave Southfork.  Meanwhile, J.R. and John Ross get into an argument.

episodes.name: Some Leave, Some Get Carried Out
episodes.overview: James decides once and for all between Michelle and Debra Lynn.  Meanwhile, J.R. and Bobby get into it over Southfork's future; John Ross decides he wants to live with Sue Ellen; and Hillary Taylor must face Michelle.

episodes.name: The Decline and Fall of the Ewing Empire
episodes.overview: Depressed over the loss of Southfork, J.R. must partner up with Cliff.  Meanwhile, Michelle is charged for Hillary Taylor's murder.

episodes.name: Conundrum (1)
episodes.overview: While contemplating suicide, J.R. has a visit from Adam who takes him on journey to see how life would be if the Ewing family had never existed.

episodes.name: Conundrum (2)
episodes.overview: Adam takes J.R. on an It's A Wonderful Life-esque journey just as Bobby hears a gunshot ring out from J.R.'s room.
